wiki.summary: “Bones” is the first single off “Mercury – Act 2”, released on March 11th, 2022. A spirited examination of life and death, the song explodes with an infectious chorus that celebrates the intangible spark that ignites our beings. “‘Bones’ is a reflection of my constant obsession with the finality and fragility of life,” says Imagine Dragons frontman Dan Reynolds. “I’m always in search of some evidence that will convince me that there is more to come – that life is truly eternal in some sense. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Bones” is the first single off “Mercury – Act 2”, released on March 11th, 2022. A spirited examination of life and death, the song explodes with an infectious chorus that celebrates the intangible spark that ignites our beings. “‘Bones’ is a reflection of my constant obsession with the finality and fragility of life,” says Imagine Dragons frontman Dan Reynolds. “I’m always in search of some evidence that will convince me that there is more to come – that life is truly eternal in some sense. Having yet to find that, I try to at least dream of what conquering death would feel like in a song.” Read more on Last.fm.
